register.reg_condition: when FEAT_ETE is implemented and FEAT_TRC_SR is implemented

purpose_text.para: In conjunction with TRCCLAIMSET, provides Claim Tag bits that can be separately set and cleared to indicate whether functionality is in use by a debug agent.
For additional information, see the CoreSight Architecture Specification.

field_description.para: Claim Tag Clear. Indicates the current status of Claim Tag bit <m>, and is used to clear Claim Tag bit <m> to 0.
The number of Claim Tag bits implemented is indicated in TRCCLAIMSET.
This bit reads-as-zero and ignores writes if m > the number of Claim Tag bits.

field_value_description.para: On a read: Claim Tag bit <m> is not set.
On a read: Claim Tag bit <m> is set.
On a write: Clear Claim tag bit <m> to 0.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
